Summary: 5 pointer triangle shaped aand the flew away to south..i recorded it..mp4
trends: There have been no other sightings in Klang
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsIts a festive here at my home..malaysian muslim celebrated 3rd day of eid!!..as exciting as it sounds..stress is another problem..suddenly i have an urged to go outside an observing the sky..just for relieve some stress..as i watched the stars,some stars really weird looking..and brightess among other stars..My mom was satnding next to me..swiping the floor..and i tell a joke that "there is a ufo celebrating eid too haha.."..my mother doesn't feel anything strange..I decided to pull my smartphone an recorded the event..the image was blur..as i was zooming,there is another shape like triangle floating right next to the bright thingy stars..and the shape was dimmer...i strunggling to find good image.trying different angle..when i do that the "ufo" is moving slowly to south..its like turning a car to u turn..it disappeared..try to find again but cannot..
